channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OK

item.title: Report E-2023100107
item.description:
Report E-2023100107

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-05T15:12:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-15
  • City: OKLAHOMA CITY
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Associate did not block and/or brace freight properly for transport. Freight was crushed causing release of product.

item.title: Report E-2023090795
item.description:
Report E-2023090795

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-30
  • City: GLENPOOL
  • State: OK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit due to improper blocking and bracing and that 4 of the metal 5 gallon cans of paint (un1263) had been crushed by the other freight and had released 20 gallons of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
